org.apache.jackrabbit.core Contains the core classes that provide the implementation of the JCR API. 
org.apache.jackrabbit.core.retention   
 

Classes in org.apache.jackrabbit.api.jsr283.retention used by org.apache.jackrabbit.api.jsr283
RetentionManager
          The RetentionManager object is accessed via javax.jcr.Session#getRetentionManager().
 

Classes in org.apache.jackrabbit.api.jsr283.retention used by org.apache.jackrabbit.api.jsr283.retention
Hold
          Hold represents a hold that can be applied to an existing node in order to prevent the node from being modified or removed.
RetentionPolicy
          An RetentionPolicy is an object with a name and an optional description.
 

Classes in org.apache.jackrabbit.api.jsr283.retention used by org.apache.jackrabbit.core
RetentionManager
          The RetentionManager object is accessed via javax.jcr.Session#getRetentionManager().
 

Classes in org.apache.jackrabbit.api.jsr283.retention used by org.apache.jackrabbit.core.retention
Hold
          Hold represents a hold that can be applied to an existing node in order to prevent the node from being modified or removed.
RetentionManager
          The RetentionManager object is accessed via javax.jcr.Session#getRetentionManager().
RetentionPolicy
          An RetentionPolicy is an object with a name and an optional description.
